metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12515 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in the function FlateStream::getChar() located at Stream.cc in Xpdf 4.01.01. It can, for example, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftoppm tool. It might allow an attacker to cause Information Disclosure or a denial of service.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> can't reproduce with poppler, no indication it is affected ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore. xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
